title: Top Places to visit in Kohima, Nagaland
content:
Kohima is the hilly capital city of India's north eastern state of Nagaland. With a resident population of 99,039 it is the second largest city in the state.
Kohima district is a district of Nagaland state in India. It is the home of the Angami Naga tribe. As of 2011, it is the second mos
